> <OLD>
>
> As Tucson allows himself to be scanned, thoughts race actively in his
> directory. He knew his downtime would have to be limited because Hydras
> was still on the loose, and the insectoids had to be dealt with.
>
> " If I may say something, Stanton, Legacy. Perceptor has proven his
> loyalty to us. He has done many favors which would have cost him his life
> if he were to be brought to Hydras now. To me that takes a lot of
> courage, and courage is something a Maximal and an Autobot are known for.
> Let's try to put things behind us, because we have a road ahead of us that
> is not shy of being perhaps one of our most difficult journeys."

<NEW>

Santon just shrugged, "I am a doctor more than a combatant." the
Maximal medic said, and despite his large size and the vicious tusks,
somewhat similar to Torca, he was just that a highly decorated doctor
and medic. "It does take courage to stand up for what you believe in,
it takes even more to stand up to do what is right."

He looked over at Perceptor, "We shall see what you do Perceptor." he
said, not totally trusting him, and yet open to perhaps that the
predacon might be trying to change.

Legacy on the other hand just looked at Tuscon his face devoid of
expression, "Scientifically speaking an individual's history is often
the best predictor of future behavior." He looked over at Perceptor,
"I look forward to observing this new behavior and seeing how it
aligns with this stated new vector in life."

> <OLD>
>
> "Still we have to reprogram Nightlight"sighed Kup"We cant allow her to
> remain in stacis much longer"
>
> "Just a warning"said dryly Perceptor"After her reprogramation she will have
> a downtime... it seems that is part of her system, when she was reprogramed
> as Blackstorm and in this time her program was containes she showed a
> downtime with no phisical explantion... I guess tha tis part of her"

Bump, the smaller of the three medics nodded, "All of these patients
will require rest anyway." he said as he prepared his medica
equipment. "We can prepare to bring her out oif stassis and transport
her here." He glanced over at Perceptor, knowing he probrably has the
greater knowldge of her status, "Perhaps keep her sedated?"

(TAG)

Preston
